column4: anyone on Ubuntu Live CD to help me with internet connectivity?
What Internet? 56k (internal? external?) ADSL (cable? ethernet? usb?)
Is your modem Ethernet (plugs in network) or USB?
OK, this is where drivers are tricky. Do you know if it is a Speedtouch (looks like a shiny crab) or SagemFast800 (says so on it) or neither?
